__e: They should be down on their fat, white knees, thanking me for saving this party from committing political seppuku.
This is what comes next-- a new life you will live on your knees, and it will take nothing more than a push of a button.
The truth is you're a beggar on your knees, and you will take whatever we shove down your throat.
On her knees, she made me swear not to leave the house.
I beg you on my knees if that will make you go.
I welcome them onto my land with open arms, and now I gotta get down on my hands and knees and beg 'em to stay?
